descrlong:
Expected npm run add -- <OPTIONS>

OPTIONS:
	--date <YYYY-MM-DD> or <YYYY/MM/DD>
	--hours <start:HHMI[-break:HHMI-endbreak:HHMI]-end:HHMI>
	--descr <description>
Expected GET, POST, PUT or DELETE.

Expected npm run config -- <OPTIONS>

OPTIONS:
	--workspace <workspace>
	--project <project>
	--task <task>
	--key <api key>
Check if param values are correct.

Expected npm run [config] [add] -- <OPTIONS>

config OPTIONS:
	--workspace <workspace>
	--project <project>
	--task <task>
	--key <api key>

add OPTIONS:
	--date <YYYY-MM-DD> or <YYYY/MM/DD>
	--hours <start:HHMI[-break:HHMI-endbreak:HHMI]-end:HHMI>
	--descr <description>
